text: Saleh Khalid Mohammed Al-Shehri (Arabic: ; born on 1 November 1993) is a Saudi Arabian professional football player, he currently plays Al Ittihad in Saudi Professional League and Saudi Arabia national football team. == Club career == In 2012, Al-Shehri joined Al-Ahli in Saudi Professional League. In 2012, Al- Shehri joined Mafra on loan. In 2012, Al-Shehri joined Beira-Mar on loan. In 2015, Al-Shehri joined Al-Raed in Saudi Professional League. In 2019, he joined Al Hilal on loan. In 2020, he joined Al Hilal without loan. In 2024, he joined Al Ittihad on a free transfer. == International career == On 21 November 2022, he beat Argentina 2-1 in 2022 FIFA World Cup. On 31 January 2024, he defeated by South Korea after penalty shootout 4-2. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Living people Category:1993 births Category:Saudi Arabian footballers Category:Al Hilal SFC players Category:2022 FIFA World Cup players Category:People from Jeddah
title: Saleh Al-Shehri
